item.title: Short Story 'Soul-Full' Published in Greater Sum
item.description: <p>I have a short story published in the debut issue (Spring 2017) of the Christian literary magazine <a href="http://www.agreatersum.com/">Greater Sum</a>! I encourage you to check it out; I guarantee that this magazine will surprise you.</p>

item.title: Welcome to the new site!
item.description: <p>Welcome to the new site! As you can probably tell, I'm moving away from a "regular blogging" format to more of a personal and project information site. News related to any open source projects will appear here, but it will likely be few and far between.</p>
